title: Indonesian Distance Self-Directed Learning Simulation Course

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Indonesian conversational skills and grammatical understanding
context.additional_context: A process for practitioners to autonomously improve Indonesian communication skills through job-linked simulations in smartphone-based accessibility-limited environments

learning_goals: Learners can utilize intermediate-level conversational expressions in five daily work scenarios (e.g., meetings, negotiations, document writing) in local Indonesian contexts with 80% accuracy via VR simulation.
Learners develop self-directed learning habits by creating weekly learning plans and recording execution status with over 90% checklist completion.
Learners achieve an average score of 75 or higher in mobile-based formative assessments (quizzes/role-plays) and diagnose learning gaps in real time.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
